titles.title: DTV Transition Assistance Act
To amend the Digital Television Transition and Public Safety Act of 2005 to provide for a coupon program for television antennas.
DTV Transition Assistance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet.

bill.summary: DTV Transition Assistance Act - Amends the Digital Television Transition and Public Safety Act of 2005 to require the Assistant Secretary for Communication of the Department of Commerce, subject to limitations, to implement and administer a program through which U.S. households may obtain coupons toward the purchase of a television antenna.
